physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features three soldiers posing and looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. All of them are wearing the same military uniforms and they have military headwear on as well. The background of the photograph displays dense greenery and trees.
title_text: Robert Arthur Polglaze and Two Other Soldiers Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portraits, Group Portrait photography Soldiers
